name: Report 46
description:
This game was made in ten days for Scream Jam 2020, for which there was no theme. This game is loosely connected to another one that I made, which I encourage you to check out.

Controls

Use A & D or your mouse to move side-to-side.

Move your mouse up and down to move your light up and down

press space when the prompt [ACTIVE SHOT] is on screen to interact, use this when [ACTIVE EXIT] is on screen to go back one room.

Report Processing...

If you find an anomaly similar to this in any GLT facility, please contact HR to file a report.

While you wait for a representative, please enjoy these cutting-edge inspirational quotes generated by our top Artificial Intelligences.

"Be winning, Play dead" - Bot k-n74

"Roadtrip into madness" By Bot I-O10

Thank you for your patience, sincerely, HrlP hELp help Heklkp Foli Alhp, Ssag Salocin .Rd

Your report has been denied because of its violation of report guideline 5.a:
"Anomalies must come from an outside source, not native to or created where it has been sighted."
